features.featureTitle: Update the PortfolioGallery component to use a responsive grid layout for displaying portfolio images. The grid should adapt to different screen sizes (e.g., 1 column on mobile, 2-3 columns on tablet, 3-4 columns on desktop) with consistent spacing between images.

Fix the broken image icons in the PortfolioGallery component by correcting the image path references. Ensure all 120 portfolio images (30 per category: home-1.png through home-30.png, commercial-1.png through commercial-30.png, office-1.png through office-30.png, hotels-1.png through hotels-30.png) load correctly from the /assets/generated/ directory using proper public asset paths.
